Long live Anarchosyndicalism!
Long live Anarchism!

The English subtitles in the link provided by Il_doctore (as well as the ones on opensubtitles.org) go progressively out of sync. 

Here are those subs resynced them for this particular rip:  http://subscene.com/english/Libertarias/subtitle-299085.aspx

They're not perfect (a few ms off here and there), but way better than the others currently available.
